FinancialGoal.name: FinancialGoal
FinancialGoal.description: This Financial Goal object is a standard Salesforce object. It represents a financial goal for a person account.

ActualAmount.description: The current amount saved toward the goal.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the goal. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

CompletionDate.description: The date when the financial goal is reached.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

Description.description: The description of the financial goal.

EstimatedSuccessPercent.description: The estimated success percentage of the financial goal. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

FinancialPlanId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

InitialAmount.description: The initial amount saved toward the goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the financial goal.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the goal.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the financial goal in an external system.

StartDate.description: The start date of the financial goal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the financial goal.

TargetAmount.description: The amount required to reach the goal.

TargetDate.description: The date when the financial goal is expected to be reached.

Type.description: Specifies the type of financial goal.

WithdrawalFrequency.description: The frequency at which the money is withdrawn. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.
